title: Keen comic (sometimes)
content:
Well, it's mainly Duke Nukem and Marine doing stuff, but Keen pops up from time to time liiiiiiiiiike last week

[url=http://www.strifestrips.com/ViewComic_StripEditor.aspx?cid=1]www.strifestrips.com/View...aspx?cid=1[/url]

Mav

title: hehe
content:
StrifeToons are done by TMST, a veteran of these forums. He links us to his work from time to time--he does awesome stuff, and he's a creative guy!
Thanks for the link.

title: Re: hehe
content:
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

Anyone know when another episode of those animated Strife Toons is out?3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: hehe
content:
I like the little Keen mice, those are so funny, lying about the place like a bunch of unemployed rats![img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Awww! Feel the love!

title: Re: hehe
content:
Dude, we always know when there's a new Strifetoon - TmsT posts them here when he's finished another one! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] ____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.
